lead_paragraph: The United States national team will play England in an exhibition game at Wembley on May 28. The match will be the first between them since England beat the United States, 2-1, at Chicago’s Soldier Field on May 28, 2005.
snippet: The United States national team will play England in an exhibition game at Wembley on May 28. The match will be the first between them since England beat the United States, 2-1, at Chicago’s Soldier Field on May 28, 2005.
